body:
Comment 2: 
Confirmed.

Compiling http://play.golang.org/p/du_paYITTO takes over 1 minute on my laptop. (and
apparently OOMs on the playground running Go 1.2)

Leaving to Russ to triage.

This is from existing Go code, as opposed to some theoretical attack on the compiler.
_Labels changed: added **release-go1.3maybe**, **repo-main**._ _Owner changed to @rsc._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
